column5: Wondering if anyone can provide an update on the road construction north of Ear Falls
Was just going to ask the exact same thing! anyone?
I know that there is 17 miles of construction between Ear Falls and Red Lake. Any more info appreciated.
Bumpy with an occasional stretch of less bumpy. 🙂 I'll have more detailed info in 6 days!
Ran 105 north last week heading for Red Lake....not a issue at all...Except for the Slooooow speed limit. Came south this morning..all good except for the slow people from Wisconsin pulling boats..
Hi. Off topic but will a 55 lb thrust minnkota bow mount move a 17' 11'' alumacraft 175? Thanks for any info. Mr crampster
hey guys they are just replacing culverts now and working on shoulders but will be repaving from the dam in ear falls to the griffith mine turn off by trout river sometime this summer
